attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It's hardly a credible representation of a democratic society when each petition is "signed" by a handfull of people.  Not one of these petitions have made any real difference. The majority in the country don't use the site, so what is the point?

rejection.details: Comments about the petitions system should be sent to number10@petitions.pm.gov.uk.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
